ABOUT:
I dreamed of Ogma It Conceptions Pvt Ltd in 2013, November with my friends and some experienced eyes of programmer and UI/UX designer who worked hard to make that dream come true to make Ogma Conceptions “A ONE STOP IT SOLUTIONS COMPANY”

As a co-founder & creative consultant, I mainly focused on marketing and flowing out my creative ideas to grow your business, visibility, and online. What sets our company apart from our competition is our distinctively client-focused approach. Our team of UI designers, visualizers, digital marketers, web developers, app developer, content writers and support staff work together to deliver cutting-edge social media marketing campaigns, website design, graphic design, mobile applications, Facebook Applications, custom written blogs, eye-catching articles and press releases, email marketing campaigns, blog site design, and much more.

Ogma Conceptions is the greatest achievement of my life. Being an entrepreneur and promoter my efforts are constantly in the direction to make it big and better day by day. The success of this company is because of great partnership we shared with our customers/vendors and we consistently try to innovate to help our customers grow their business - product offerings and revenue enhancement.

Please reach out to my team directly at contact@ogmaconceptions.com or call us at +91 6289113328

My Wantz is not a traditional online classifieds service, nor a collective buying intermediary, a price comparison site or a reverse classifieds service, but yet it is a platform that incorporates the best part of the DNA of each to create a new business concept.

This new concept is the result of a very deep reflection, and it was built over very strong hypotheses deriving from different fields of the human knowledge, to answer a generalized version of the Freudian question: what does a person want?
